import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk unlink assets"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/bulk/unlink"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Removes parent/child relationships for multiple assets in a single operation. Use this when decommissioning bundles (for example, a cart with attached accessories) or detaching child devices from a parent asset after reassignment.

**Prerequisites**
1. **AssetIds** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) or [POST /api/v1.0/assets/by-assetname](/docs/api/assets/get-assets-by-name) to locate assets and collect their IDs.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search for the child assets and gather `Items[].AssetId`.
2. [POST /api/v1.0/assets/bulk/unlink](/docs/api/assets/bulk-unlink-assets) with `AssetIds` and optional `ParentAssetId` to clear relationships.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `AssetIds` (request body).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"AssetIds":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"Request":{"type":"object","properties":{"ParentAssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}}},"title":"BulkUnlinkAssetsRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Assets unlinked successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Assets unlinked successfully","properties":{"Item":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"StatusCode":{"type":"integer"}},"title":"BulkUnlinkAssetsResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
